title: Justification - Verify Solution to Diff Eq

content.question: Which of the following is a solution to the differential equation <math alttext="the derivative of y with respect to x, equals, e raised to the 2 x power, plus 2 y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="y equals, e raised to the 2 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="y equals, the negative of e raised to the 2 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="y equals, x times e raised to the 2 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="y equals, negative x, times e raised to the 2 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="y equals, x times e raised to the 2 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.G: Confirm that solutions are accurate and appropriate.
